text:
Taylor Swift's Reputation came out yesterday, where Swift appears to take lyrical jabs at many of her rivals, including Kim Kardashian, Kardashian's husband (and longtime Swift enemy) Kanye West, and of course, frenemy Katy Perry. None of the three have posted any acknowledgement or response to the songs about them. (In fact, back when first Kimye response song "Look What You Made Me Do" came out, TMZ went so far as to report via sources that Swift's feud with Kardashian and West isn't even on the couple's radar; they care that little.)

But Kardashian did post clear proof that she and her daughter North West were living their best lives last night, coincidentally at Perry's Los Angeles Witness tour concert. She shared multiple Instagram stories of herself singing along to "E.T.", the Perry song that West collaborated on:

She and her daughter North even hung with Perry during the show. Kardashian posted a kissy-face receipt:

Instagram

What Perry and Kardashian talked about only they will ever know, but the timing is statement-making—and deliberately so, it'd seem. Perry played the Staples Center in LA for three nights in a row, but Kardashian chose Reputation Friday—and Perry's last show—to go. Hmm...
authors: Where She Oversees Coverage Of Celebrities
title: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry Hang Out on Taylor Swift Reputation Release Day

og.title: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry Spent 'Reputation' Friday Together

meta_data.title: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry Hang Out on Taylor Swift Reputation Release Day - North West and Kim at Witness World Tour

meta_data.sailthru.socialtitle: Kim Kardashian and Katy Perry Spent 'Reputation' Friday Together
